resources.string: Your place to connect\nwith other dancers

Location Services
to improve your experience
Your actual location is not
provided to other users

Your username should be your stage name granted to you on your enrolment with your studio. The city your studio is in is also stated on your enrolment form. You can upload a photo of your enrolment form, and it will be reviewed by an administrator. You will be granted the requested stage name if the enrollment information is accurate.
Request received\nYour enrolment form will be reviewed.\nA response to your enquiry will be sent to the email address you entered on the form.
Please select your username, this should ideally be your stage name granted to you by your studio.
Please confirm your stage name. This action cannot be undone.
